title: Secrets of the river
itunes:title: Secrets of the river
itunes:subtitle: Lara Maiklem, author of Mudlarking, describes some of the fascinating historical objects she has discovered while scouring the banks of the Thames. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Lara Maiklem, author of the bestselling book Mudlarking, describes some of the fascinating historical objects she has discovered while scouring the banks of the Thames over the past 15 years. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
